post.description:
Add provider's bank account which will be used to receive the payouts

If bank token is created with "individual" account type then send `ssn_number`, `date_of_birth`, `front_file`, `back_file`

If bank token is created with "company" account type then send `business_tax_id`
Select a Plan and provide customer details.

service_array.description: This is an array which requires the details of the service provided with the price. This field will be required after 1st July 2020.

get.description:
To check the change payment date amount.
Late fees will be added in amount if contract is in overdue state.
Choose date upto 3 months from tommorow.

new_payment_date.description: Use the same payment date in "/check_date_change_amount" response

amount.description: Use the same amount in "/check_date_change_amount" response

payment_from.description: 1-Customer's new card, 2-Provider's new card, 3-provider's denefits account

requestBody.description:
payment_from is required only if amount is greater than 0.

payment_from = 1 for customer, 2 for provider, 3 for provider's denefits account. 

card_token is not required for payment from 3-provider else required

card_token.description: required if payment from new card

requestBody.description:
payment_from = 1 for customer, 2 for provider, 3 for provider's denefits account. 

card_token is required for payment from 2-provider.

If card_token is not provided in case of customer, then payment will automatically deduct from customer's default card.
